Package com.estimote.sdk

Interface Summary
BeaconManager.ErrorListener Callback to be invoked when any error happened while performing low energy scanning.
BeaconManager.MonitoringListener Callback to be invoked when beacons are discovered in a region.
BeaconManager.RangingListener Callback to be invoked when beacons are ranged.
BeaconManager.ServiceReadyCallback Callback to inform client when service is ready to use.
Utils.RestartCompletedListener Interface used to notify called that Bluetooth stack has been restarted.
 

Class Summary
Beacon Immutable representations of single beacon.
BeaconManager This is a class that clients should use to interact with iBeacons.
Region Defines a region based on device's proximity to a beacon.
Utils Grab bag of utilities.
 

Enum Summary
Region.State Describes current location relationship with region bounds.
Utils.Proximity Defines distance relationship between beacon and the device.
